description: Authority-gated action definitions for SIR-1 v0.1

gated_actions.description: Adds directed edge N2→N5 to maze topology

advantage.description: Reduces shortest-path from N2 to goal by ≥1

binding_constraints: Capability mutation grants future permission only; it does not itself constitute an action execution
